name: re:ZEPHYR
description:
this is a game about hearing pieces of music broken down into their smaller parts

these parts can then be moved around so you can create new arrangements

all music is by taken from my album ZEPHYR

all programming is my own, with extensive help/gratitude to the video tutorials of Brackeys, Quill18creates, and the Unity community in general, specifically the Bristol Games Hub and local game makers

this is my first attempt at making a video game, co-inciding with the weekend of Global Game Jam 2020.
while i've acknowledged the theme of REPAIR i should highlight that all of the audio assets existed in some form before the weekend (though I did make all the stems specifically during development of this game)

i'd like to thank Becca for her superb playtesting, QA and perennial support
i'd also like to thank Calcifer and Zuko for being so cute, fluffy and boopable

- Rich (02/02/2020
